Articles.Content:
I am trying to run kss on a modded install, loading the game works fine but when I arrive at the main menu. I can’t click anything! When I try the cursor does go green to indicate I did click. I suspected that it was caused by a mod incompatibility so I tried it on a clean install and it worked perfectly fine. I don’t want to go through all my mods one at a time running the game to find it, so I was wondering if you guys have a list of incompatibilities for it?

 

here is the mod in question.

If you guys need a screenshot of my game data folder I am happy to provide it.
Moved thread to the Technical Support/Modded Installs section of the forum.

Greetings and welcome to the forum, @silverbird.

A good method to find incompatibilities is to cut and paste half your mods out of the gamedata folder and see if KSP runs.  If it does the issue is with the removed mods if not it's still in gamedata.  Do this a few times and you should quickly zone in on the problem.

3 hours ago, James Kerman said:

Greetings and welcome to the forum, @silverbird.

A good method to find incompatibilities is to cut and paste half your mods out of the gamedata folder and see if KSP runs.  If it does the issue is with the removed mods if not it's still in gamedata.  Do this a few times and you should quickly zone in on the problem.

I did this a while ago and found that the problem was community either community category kit or kerbal inventory system.

3 hours ago, silverbird said:

I did this a while ago and found that the problem was community either community category kit or kerbal inventory system.

Ok.  If all your mods are up to date I recommend posting your KSP output logs so that people way smarter than me can see if they can help.

The instructions are here:

KSS has a list of mods that it's compatible with on the front page. Any part pack should be compatible too unless it requires a certain planet to work. No planet packs are compatible with KSS, though.
